FALLBACK.MESSAGE_TITLE: Sorry, something went wrong with this application
FALLBACK.MESSAGE_FEEDBACK: Our team has been notified. If you would like to help, please, tell us what happened below.

ASSISTANTS.TITLE: Assistants Settings
ASSISTANTS.NAME: Assistant Name
ASSISTANTS.URL: Please enter a working link to your desired image.
ASSISTANTS.CREATE: Please create at least one assistant.

CHAT.TITLE: Chat Settings
CHAT.SEND_ALL_INFO: If checked, all previous messages will be included in the prompt sent to the chatbot, instead of only messages from the current exchange.

EXCHANGES.TITLE: Exchanges Settings
EXCHANGES.CREATE_ASSISTANT: Please create at least one assistant.
EXCHANGES.ON_COMPLETE_HELPER: This text will be shown once the given number of follow up questions have been answered. Leave blank for no message.
EXCHANGES.HARD_LIMIT_INFO: If checked, the next exchange will start automatically after the number of follow up questions is reached.
EXCHANGES.CREATE: Please create at least one exchange.
